question: Question
keys.empty: You do not trust any sites yet.
p11-pin.1: A website has requested permission to use your local certificates and keys.
p11-pin.2: To provide it access you will need to provide the PIN or password protecting them.
key-pin.1: %1 has requested permission to use your local certificates, keys, and smart cards.
key-pin.2: If this number matches what is displayed by the application and you want to provide access choose %1.
error.ssl.install: Unable to install the SSL certificate for imza.io as a trusted root certificate. The application will not work until this is resolved.
question.new.token:
We detected a unsupported smart card or token.
Would you like to request support be added for this token?
question.2key.remove: Do you want to remove %1 from the trusted list?
warning.title.oh_no: Oh no, that did not work!
warn.ssl.install: We need to make the imza.io SSL certificate trusted. When we do this you will be asked for your administrator password.
warn.ssl.renew: SSL certificate requires renew. Please run the imza.io EASY installer to renew a certificate.
warn.token.crypto_not_found: The inserted smart card is supported by imza.io EASY but we were unable to find middleware for the card. Make sure (%1) exists, if not install the smart cards middleware and try again.
warn.token.crypto_wrong:
A problem occurred loading the middleware (%1) for your security token or smart card.
Please make sure the middleware is installed correctly and try again.
warn.pcsc.cannot_start: It looks like the `Smart Card Resource Manager` is not running. Please start this service and start imza.io EASY again.
keys.empty.search: There are no websites matching that search.

tools.esign.desc: Sign with electronic signature to any file or document
tools.mobile.desc: Display files or documents that requested electronic signature with imza.io Mobile and sign remotely
